features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive dashboard for admins to view user performance analysis, compliance charts, and topic focus suggestions.

features.name: User Authentication & Profiles
features.description: User signup, login, and detailed profile management including employee ID tracking.

features.name: Assessment Engine
features.description: System for presenting questions, timing tests, and calculating results based on user answers.

features.name: Real-time Analytics
features.description: WebSocket-based monitoring of page views, visitors, and generation timestamps.

features.name: Responsive Landing Page
features.description: Mobile-optimized home page with hero carousel and navigation.
